metadata.title: CVE-2024-26664 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: hwmon:(coretemp) Fix out-of-bounds memory access Fix a bug that pdata->cpu_map[]is set before out-of-bounds check. The problem might be triggered onsystems with more than 128 cores per package.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
